channel.title: Slow Conversations on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti
channel.description: Recent content in Slow Conversations on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti

item.title: Slow conversations with a daily deadline and an unanswered question
item.description: Tom Munnecke reminds me of a slow conversation we have been having for a few years.  I noted it here about five years ago.  Five years is a pretty good time to stretch out a single line of thinking, so it's worthwhile reflecting on how much current writing structure allows for some amount of leisurely conversation in the face of a daily deadline. The hard part about taking a question slowly is that most of what I end up writing for AnnArbor.
